TextLibrary.Text: There's only one planet in this system. The rest are rubble.
There's only one planet in this system. The rest are rubble.
MRI exterminated most of the Krystalli years ago. Not one of our finer moments, and not one they teach you about in the academy.
MRI exterminated most of the Krystalli years ago. Not one of our finer moments, and not one they teach you about in the academy.
The Krystalli were telepaths. The competition was... unhealthy.
The Krystalli were telepaths. The competition was... unhealthy.
A few remain, scattered amongst the moons in this system and others. Speaking of which we should find a moon and hide on it. Nobody will find us here.
A few remain, scattered amongst the moons in this system and others. Speaking of which we should find a moon and hide on it. Nobody will find us here.
